name: kryonix-plataforma
description: Plataforma SaaS KRYONIX - 100% AutÃ´noma por IA

scripts.build:render: npm run migrate && npm run build-fast
scripts.build-emergency: echo 'Emergency build mode' && npm run build-fast
scripts.check-deps-inline: node -e "console.log('ðŸ” KRYONIX - Verificando dependÃªncias crÃ­ticas...'); const deps = ['next', 'react', 'react-dom', 'express', 'cors', 'helmet', 'body-parser', 'morgan']; let missing = []; deps.forEach(dep => { try { require(dep); console.log('âœ… ' + dep + ': OK'); } catch(e) { console.error('âŒ ' + dep + ': FALTANDO'); missing.push(dep); } }); if (missing.length === 0) { console.log('ðŸŽ‰ Todas as dependÃªncias crÃ­ticas instaladas!'); } else { console.error('âŒ DependÃªncias faltando: ' + missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.validate-install-inline: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const pkg = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8')); const deps = Object.keys(pkg.dependencies); console.log('ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ Validando ' + deps.length + ' dependÃªncias...'); let installed = 0; deps.forEach(dep => { try { require.resolve(dep); installed++; } catch(e) { console.error('âŒ Falta: ' + dep); } }); console.log('âœ… Instaladas: ' + installed + '/' + deps.length); if (installed !== deps.length) process.exit(1);"
scripts.preinstall: node -e "console.log('ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ KRYONIX - Preparando instalaÃ§Ã£o...'); console.log('Node.js:', process.version); console.log('npm:', process.env.npm_version || 'unknown'); console.log('Platform:', process.platform); console.log('âœ… Ambiente validado');"
scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('./check-dependencies.js'); } catch(e) { console.log('âš ï¸ check-dependencies.js nÃ£o encontrado, pulando verificaÃ§Ã£o durante build'); }"
scripts.fast-setup: npm run optimize && npm run build-ultra-fast
